About

Hosted on this site are tools for; signing text via connected crypto currency wallet, as well as verifying signed messages. These are intended to provided coding comrades working examples, without any warranty, of how to build crypto wallet integration agnostic of any frontend framework (meta or otherwise).

Please review the Terms of Service, prior attempting use of this site or provided tools.

You may audit the source code of this website from its GitHub repository.

  • Source code: GitHub
